Bash("C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\GH CLI\\gh.exe" release create v2.5.1 "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.zip" "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.exe" --title "v2.5.1" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Changes
- **ZIP-based updates**: Auto-update now downloads ZIP files instead of EXE to avoid corporate security/antivirus blocking
- **Settings live refresh**: "Hide when no study" checkboxes now immediately show/hide indicator and clinical history windows
- **Timeout fixes**: Added 15 second timeout for update check, 5 minute timeout for downloads \(prevents hanging on blocked networks\)
- **Startup fix**: Indicator and clinical history windows now respect "hide when no study" setting on startup
- **AHK integration fix**: MainForm has unique window title for reliable PostMessage targeting

## Download Options
- **MosaicTools.zip** - Recommended for corporate environments \(avoids security blocks\)
- **MosaicTools.exe** - Direct executable for permissive environments
EOF
\)")

Bash("C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\GH CLI\\gh.exe" release create v2.5.2 "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.zip" "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.exe" --title "v2.5.2" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Fix
- Settings save now properly respects "hide when no study" settings for indicator and clinical history windows
EOF
\)")

Bash("C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\GH CLI\\gh.exe" release create v2.5.4 "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.exe" --title "v2.5.4" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Changes

- **Faster report popup** - Now uses direct scraping instead of Alt+C clipboard \(eliminates race conditions\)
- **Improved report formatting** - Clean display with proper section spacing:
  - Single blank line between sections
  - Content joined into paragraphs \(TECHNIQUE, CLINICAL HISTORY, etc.\)
  - FINDINGS subsections with sentences joined on same line
  - IMPRESSION numbered items on own lines
- **Live popup updates** - Report popup auto-updates when Process Report is pressed while open
- **Better discard handling** - Discard Study now properly hides clinical history and indicator windows when no study is open
- **Discard closes popup** - Report popup closes when study is discarded
EOF
\)")
